summary: The which-key `cond` parameter controls mapping functionality, not popup visibility. The recommended solution is to use buffer-local keymaps with vim.keymap.set() and desc parameter, which which-key automatically discovers and displays.

artifacts.summary: Research report detailing why cond doesn't work for conditional popup display, the maintainer-recommended solution using buffer-local keymaps, and implementation plan extending config/ui.lua setup_compose_keymaps()
